reviews.review_msg: He is really nice and supportive. Also inspiring and has lots of knowledge. His lectures are quite heavy but none of the slides are irrelevant to the exam so pay attention! Just listen to him and focus during the class, you're good
He is so nice. The lectures are quite heavy due to the length of the powerpoint slides, but it's reasonable. Professor was inspiring
he is so nice, i hope take other courses with him again

A very nice professor and I can not find another word to describe a so nice professor. He is also a generous grader as long as you do your best in ur three projects. I would happy to see this professor again.

He is a nice person but he was not able to express the idea clearly. The class was lecture heavy ( very), however, I felt very lost after class because there wasn't a main point throughout the whole lecture. He could not explain the big ideas that we needed to understand. His powerpoint slides were messy as well.

Andreas is very kind and ready to help. His lectures contain of too much information and he is the only one who talks. Sometimes it's difficult to concentrate during it. Suggestion- show him that you are interested in his subject he appreciate that.  Midterm is fine. Final is super difficult. (No open book) Assignments are pretty interesting.
